title: Press Release: Bill Signed: S. 111 | The White House
content: On Tuesday, July 25, 2023, the President signed into law: S. 111, the “Providing Accountability Through Transparency Act of 2023,” which requires each agency, in providing notice of a rulemaking, to include a link to a 100-word plain language summary of the proposed rule. Thank you to Senators Lankford, Sinema, Johnson, Risch, Braun, and Peters for their leadership.
